tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE grant_writing_projects (
  project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  team_member_id INT NOT NULL,
  project_description TEXT,
  project_status ENUM('ongoing', 'completed', 'pending')
);

CREATE TABLE project_contributors (
	contributor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	project_id INT,
	contributor_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	role VARCHAR(50),
	FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES grant_projects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE grant_projects (
    project_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    project_title TEXT NOT NULL,
    project_description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE team_members (
    member_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    member_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    email TEXT NOT NULL,
    role TEXT,
    joined_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE project_teams (
    team_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT NOT NULL,
    member_id INT NOT NULL,
    team_role TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES grant_projects(project_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (member_id) REFERENCES team_members(member_id)
);

CREATE TABLE grant_proposals (
  proposal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_id INT,
  submission_date DATE,
  proposal_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES grant_projects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE grant_updates (
  update_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  proposal_id INT,
  update_date DATE,
  update_description TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (proposal_id) REFERENCES grant_proposals(proposal_id)
);

CREATE TABLE grant_comments (
  comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  update_id INT,
  commenter_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  comment_text TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (update_id) REFERENCES grant_updates(update_id)
);
